about_the_game:
We're Getting Deeper Into The Abyss is a story game about mental health, all while using the beautiful tone of music, all while characters develop overtime. Players will be able to follow the journey of the main character, Frei Kay, and his mysterious power of his "music."

Follow along the story while you, the player, can explore around a small open world, with interactions with the public, and don't worry, they all live their lives and won't get in their way. Unless, they decide to toss some mischief at you, last second. The town has side stories that end in their own and unique way. Watch as our main character, Frei, develops.

What's The Features?


  • A rich story, with an open world to explore.

Why explore? The town is filled with fun things to do, so why not find out yourself and go explore? It's all in the journey to come.

  • Unique characters, with a different path depending on your choice.

Please, be mindful of the choices you pick. There are some paths that you can't go back on!

  • The world is all 3D, with lovely lighting. While the characters, some items are all 2D. It's a 2.5D game, baby!

That's right, this world is lovely. There will be a lot of things going on in this world, too. What does this mean? Y"know, the basic birds, and animals, people... It'll be living! It won't be empty, just know this for sure! For a lovely world, it must be active!

Join The Discord! Follow Development!




Please, feel free to join the Discord and make it active by asking questions, and following development. Please refer to announcements for more news!

content_descriptors.notes:
Please note, this game features many mentions of multiple mental illnesses, triggers, suicide, and multiple things that could be harmful to the player. 

Please be aware.

name: We're Getting Deeper Into The Abyss

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core I5-8400 / Ryzen 5 5600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 1060Ti / AMD Radeon RX 5700 XT
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: SSD is a preference!
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core I7-8700K / Ryzen 5 5600x
  • Memory: 16 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce RTX 3060 or Higher / AMD Radeon RX 5700 XT
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: SSD is a preference!
